org.nlpcraft.client

Class NCClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nlpcraft.client.NCClientBuilder

  • public class NCClientBuilder
extends Object
    Builder for the NCClient instances.

    Usage
    Client builder usage is straightforward: 

         // Get client instance.
     NCClient cli = new NCClientBuilder()
         .setLogin("admin@admin.com", "admin"),
         .setBaseUrl("http://localhost:8081/api/v1/")
         .build();

     // Perform any necessary calls...
     NCResult res = cli.askSync("my.model.id", txt);

     // Close client & sign out at the end.
     cli.close();

      • setEmbeddedProbe

        public NCClientBuilder setEmbeddedProbe(boolean embeddedMode)
        Sets embedded probe mode flag. If set to true the implementation will expect that the embedded probe is running in the local JVM and will receive query result via local callbacks. See NCEmbeddedProbe class for more details.
        Parameters:
        embeddedMode - Embedded probe mode.
        Returns:
        Current client builder.
        See Also:
        DFLT_EMBEDDED_PROBE

      • build

        public NCClient build()
               throws IOException,
                      NCClientException
        Builds a client instance with configured settings.
        Returns:
        Newly created instance of NCClient.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown in case of any I/O errors.
        NCClientException - Thrown in case of any NLPCraft-specific errors.
